title: Fix admin panel authorization and appointment display issues

requirements.text: Fix the 'Unauthorized: Only admins can view all appointments' error in the admin panel by ensuring the backend correctly identifies authenticated admin users when they access the getAllAppointments function

quotes: admin panel me ye problem solve karo Unauthorized: Only admins can view all appointments

acceptanceCriteria: Admin users logged in with username '6352174912' and password '63521' can successfully access the admin panel without authorization errors
The getAllAppointments backend function returns appointment data instead of throwing unauthorized errors
Error message 'Unauthorized: Only admins can view all appointments' no longer appears in the admin panel

requirements.text: Ensure appointments are properly displayed in the admin panel table after successful authentication

quotes: admin panel me apoint ment bhi nahi dikh rahi usko bhi solve karo

acceptanceCriteria: All existing appointments are fetched and displayed in the admin panel table
Appointments show all relevant fields including patient name, phone, service type, date, and status
The appointment list updates properly when new appointments are created
Search and filter functionality works correctly with the displayed appointments

constraints: Maintain the existing admin credentials (username: '6352174912', password: '63521')
Do not modify the frontend authentication flow in useAdminAuth hook
Preserve the existing appointment table UI and filtering features
nonGoals: Adding new admin features beyond fixing the authorization issue
Modifying the appointment booking flow for regular users
